DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective pilot study compare functional anatomic outcome chronic macular edema secondary branch retinal vein occlusion ( BRVO ) treat argon laser photocoagulation versus intravitreal ranibizumab ( Lucentis® ) injection versus combination .
DOC.brief_title: Ranibizumab Branch Retinal Vein Occlusion Associated Macular Edema Study ( RABAMES )
